1.content:
"And that's all. We're done, My boy."

"Thank You, Grandma."

"Oh, I'm glad you found that old tome and brought it to me, your parents didn't like that you entered into the arcane arts." Said a kindly old woman as she sat down on the old, rocky chair, you bowed to her holding an old book, you smiled.

"They're not here, aren't they." The old woman chuckled on that response.

"Yes, they're not." She says and sighed "Your mother has such a promising potential but she discarded it all for meaningless material gain." She says in disappointment.

"I'm glad to prove you that I'm not like her." You said to her, you were an average guy, with an average family or so you though, turns out that your family from your mother side has been mages from the longest of time and frankly you were skeptical until you found the tome and saw its content, you started doing what its written out of pure boredom and you saw how each practice began to get genuine effects on you and your surroundings.

You show it to your grandmother, she implied to be a witch in the past but originally thought to be a joke.

She was serious about it.

She taught you more than just what its told in the book, she thought you how to mold reality around you, to become invisible, shrink, grows and Teleports and even planewalking and mass alteration. But warned you that using all those things at once may tire you as you didn't have the mana pools required to do those things, so far, she gave you the "basics." to experiment with it

"Yes, I'm too, too bad that this is far I can teach you."

"Uh? Why?"

"The Arcane School encourage the apprentices to create their own spells and experiment with potions to branch out their own type of style, there are guides on how so written in that book but you're in your own." She says "My spells are too complex for you to learn, built and made with extra steps to follow with utmost perfection, not fit for trial and error unless you wanna lose some part of your body or don't mind scarring."

You flinched in the thought of that.

"But don't worry sweetie, creating spells may sound like a chore but its quite practical to sharpen your abilities and knowledge. Alternatively, you could try just planewalking and pick a power from that dimension and work on a spell from it." The old lady says "I did it that way."

"Really?" You ask in disbelief "Is really that easy?"

"Well, no, you still had to create the basis of the spell, sorcery and managed the mana required from it." She says "But you'll jump many steps doing it this way, besides, the travels themselves are reward enough."

"I see, so go to a different plane and see, seems easy."

"it is. sometimes it is more productive than it advertised by the school." She confessed, "sometimes, mages take vacations to the multiverse at large, sometimes, even get new lives traveling." She then turns grim "But many either get lost traveling or lose their lives on worlds they aren't prepared for. This is the reason why it is a good idea to create spells before going into travels."

You gulped a bit nervous, the old woman chuckled "I think I scared you enough, be sure to go into universes you know before thinking on travel."

"Wait... Think of a Universe?" You asked in curiosity, your grandmother nods

"Yes, my boy, you see, all those works of fiction? they're real, my boy." She reveals with a fond smile "The Multiverse is big and ever expanding, for every work fiction, every idea, every story told or even a concept, its real somewhere in the everlasting multiverse and our craft allows us to explore it all, All we have to do... is to think about it the moment we leave."

"... That's it? I thought it would involve a very complicated ritual."

"No, no, no." The old woman chuckled as she shakes her head "Those are television cliches, there is not ritual only the right incantations and even then, its short one that takes like four words, the right mana output and the thought of the world you wanna go in." That's sound amazing, imagine go to different worlds like Naruto, Smash Bros or

"I don't know... that's sound really easy, Too easy, Any universe I can think of?"

"Yes, dear." She confirmed "Oh, I remember when I went in my first travel, I tought on my favorite book series, it was my ideal fantasy world and the idea of going to it made it a dream come true, I even met my heroes... it was then I noticed something was wrong."

"Wrong?"

"Yes I forgot to tell you this... you see, the multiverse is big, we go to a universe that we believe we know but upon seeing it for the very first time in our own eyes, we start to see details that don't add up from what we know, it can range from smaller, barely noticeable things but then are times we see things completely different that make no sense with the information we know. It is then we truly come to understand that not all what we know can be applied to the real universe we visit." She paused. "My heroes were the same, spiritually but they were different, as in different genders." Your eyes widen on this

"The Main Heroine I used to idolize was, in reality, a hunk of a man and he was... really good with his hands" She chuckled, you cringe, trying to not think of your elderly grandmother getting all frisky with an Adonis. "We dated even, the love interest was still a man and he didn't bend that way but our relationship didn't make it." She then looked grim "Just like in the story, he died in a heroic fashion, I tried my best to make the ending different, to let him share the same fate as the heroine from the book but as the chosen one, that type of sacrifice was needed for the world to survive."

"I'm sorry to hear that, grandma..."

"Oh, that's fine, dear, I moved on. But yes, remember what I've told you and you'll be a splendid Sorcerer by then and now please, can you help me bake some Cookies?"

***


Its been months since that talk, Your grandmother went missing days after that, giving you a letter that she went on vacation and to visit some "friends".

You know what that means, it was time for you to do the same to complete your training and besides, you may as well enjoy your time as you go through the multiverse, before making the portal, you began to start by placing a runic beacon to an object of yours, this beacon was to help you return back to your world.

With that done, you began the incantation of the portal, the recited the words as your mana flared up, a purple vortex appeared right in front of you, swirling with arcane energy. You had a world in mind and grinned
as you walked straight into the vortex and onto the new world, one thta could help you progress or just to observe and interact with the locals, to see characters of fiction made real.

The world you thought was...

Dylan the littlest giant dalmatian: In this hilarious fractured fairy tale starring the cast of 101 Dalmatian Street, Dylan Dalmatian the eldest son of a family of giant anthropomorphic animated dalmatians and his family, make a bet with their older brother and eldest son that he can travel to a nearby town, help the town's citizens and mayor with whatever they need help with, woo a lovely lady dog that lives in her hometown and defend that town from an evil giantess known as Clarissa Corgi who constantly terrorizes that town on a daily basis as she always smashes any and all buildings that happens to directly stand in her path along with eating everything in sight as our hero will try his best to defend a town he's in from Clarissa Corgi.

Snow Summer and the seven sumo stooges: In this hilarious musical fractured fairy tale that combines elements of Snow White and the seven dwarfs, the seven samurai and the three stooges, Snow Summer is an anthropomorphic animated blue Merle border collie princess who befriends the seven sumo stooges as the fun begins as the seven sumo stooges hear about Snow Summer's plight as they try to defend her from her vain stepmother the evil queen Clarissa Corgi as hilarity and slapstick comedy ensues.

You had been living here for almost a week and the town had moved on from it, apparently, after being target of the strangest occurrences Ponyville had seen, seeing a magical portal manifesting from seemly nowhere or that a magician alien came out from was pretty tame compared from what they had seen in the past.

Nevertheless, you were received in by a friendly but curious community, a bit wary but still friendly for the most part.

You pretty much told you were a journalist and scholar was looking for a place rest while your energies recharge and so far, they believed that. Turns out that the Mane Six are in the Crystal Empire to see Princess Cadence and Prince Shining Armor and their Daughter, Flurry Heart.

So you arrived ON that Episode? Maybe is just a coincidence

Well, there isn't much to do now.

So far, Mayor Mare was happy when you brought a tiny house on the town's outskirts that didn't question duplicated Bits but she did question why you didn't go for an Inn or Hotel.

You told that you were going to stay for much longer then go back to your home planet.

Satisfied with that answer, you brought the property and began to work on it. The small house had two rooms, a bathroom and a kitchen but you used your magic to work, expanding the infrastructure and dimensional layers, in other words, making it bigger inside. After working on it for an hour, You had a mansion inside with two floors and multiple rooms with personal bathrooms, offices and an indoor pool, class Olympic.

It took you the entire week but now it was Done.

You didn't come out for some time but rather went to Twilight's Castle mostly for books, it used to be a library before Tirek destroyed it and is still is in someway, You took several books from it with the help of the winged baby dragon (He is cuter in person!) Spike that looked surprised in seeing you but other wise helped you on getting the books.

They were mostly magic books and history books.

You duplicated them and returned them in the same day much to the drake surprise.

It is likely that he sent a letter detailing about you to the princesses and Twilight, at first, he didn't give much importance other than you were a visitor from far away.

You lived like a hermit, You didn't bother exploring the town, at least no for now.

Until...

153132.title: Read Equestrian History (Other Equestrian Options)

choices: Go on Equestria's culture next. (More Equestria Options)
1531322.content:
First, you started with pony story, beginning with the tribes' formations and the stories behind them, there were several parallels Earth's Ancient Story and Civilizations. With Pegasus being similar to ancient Greeks or Romans, a set of pegasus towns unified into a mini kingdom by the iron hoof of Ponious Ceasar, they were the more warlike and expansionist minded of all the other tribes. They conquered and enslaved ground dwellers for food, riches and were the owners of the skies, they were on odds with Gryphons and Dragons for this aerial control

Earth Ponies has parallels with the Portuguese, Spaniards, Russians and Frenchs during the Renaissance era and unlike the warlike pegasus, they were farmers, miners and traders their goods to the Pegasus so they get the weather conditions needed for their farms and livelihood. It was also a way to prevent the pegasus or unicorns to enslave them by enabling necessary trade. They grew resentful of the two tribes because of their demanding nature.

The Unicorns had parallels with Medieval England, France, and Germany and were the most magical minded of the group as noted for their horns, it was also made them believe to be superior to the other tribes because of this trait. With their power combined, they could move the sun and the moon at will and were rightfully feared of this trait alone which only helped in feeding their egos.

The Tribes depended on each other despite the apparent hostility they have with each other. The Unicorns believed the Earth Ponies and Pegasus being Primitives and Brutes, Pegasis believed the two tribes to be spineless cowards and Earth Ponies disliked the arrogance or warlike nature of the two other species.

From there, you didn't find much difference to the show, they united after seeing that fighting over a land big enough for the three tribes weren't worth it and the cold conditions of their old land, Equinian, were following over thanks to the wendigos.

From there, all seems normal.

Until this.

There was a fourth tribe.

One that had a kingdom rooted in Equestria long before the other tribes arrived

The Alicorn Kingdom. It has no real-world parallel but found in Fantasy and Pop Culture, Elves. Living in spirally cities or none by having a perfect communion with the forests, like the Everfree, It is said that they have much more power than all the other tribes but how they lived or what happened to them is a total mystery, they simply disappeared once the tribes settled in Equestria alongside several races that used to call them home, Like Pixies, Fairies and... Humanity.

Humans were here too.

You hastily began searching for more info of humans in Equestria with your lexicon but it's scarce and limited but found inscriptions coming from a book called the "The Last of the Alicorn's legacy" and has a page dedicated to the "Kingdom of Men".

That was the information of your lexicon can provide, resuming the lengthy manuscript

"Enemy of Dragons, Rivals of Griffins, And Stelward Ally to the Alicorn Kingdom, Led by the Lord King Karl Gwyn, Relying on Metal, Stone, Faith and strong will" a Prose of the last known Alicorn Queen, Solaria Dawn


It taled a time before Equestrian's foundation, in how the Human Kingdom defended the Alicorns from total annihilation caused by the expansionist Dragons Warlords. In return, The Alicorns though Humans their form of magic and the two Kingdoms pushed back the Dragon Onslaught from their lands.

Anything else beyond that was a complete mystery.

There are theories such a war of mutual destruction to grand exodus but nothing really conclusive.

Even known Alicorns such as Luna and Celestia are relatively young that only appeared after ten thousand years of the civilizations' disappearance.

Fascinating, so You're not the only human in Equestria... well, they might think you hail from an ancient kingdom that used to exist BEFORE the ponies. And the Alicorns? You know that Celestia and Luna were created by the Tree of Harmony, maybe they were created based on the real alicorns that somehow went... extinct?

You might have to continue to go to the library for more books for more knowledge to the topic

Next!

15313222.title: Go on Equestria's culture next. (More Eque...

153132222.content:
Equestria culture is known to flaunt openly their sexuality. Equestria has an ever-evolving culture but one that remained the same was the understanding of their friends through intimate means. This movement is what saved early Equestrian from a secured extinction and what helped the colonization, expansion, and foundation far easier.

During the early days, Equestria's stallion population was far less numerous than it is today and with the threat of extinction looming, the tribes begrudgingly began breeding with one another, creating herds around the Stallions with Mares of different tribes, the result ended favorably. What initiated like an obligation to preserve the pony species ended in a positive experience for all those involved, creating interracial friendship and family units, over time, the predijuce between tribes began to subside rapidly and thus making a unified species moved to a single goal on living together.

Since then, Sex is more common than in other cultures and sometimes used as a recreational enjoyinment rather than just reproductive porpuse although for both isn't uncommon among herds, adventurous singles or married. Ever passing centuries clothes found more useful to display status, in a social gathering or for exposition and fashion.

This behavoir isn't just limited to just ponies, Due to the friendly Equestrian nature, mating between other species such as Dragons, Changelings, Kirin, and Griffins are noted as well even foals born from said breeding are recorded, Most children born are ponies but gryphon cubs, changelings nymph and dragon whelpling birth and hatching are known. Changeling shares this kind of libidious nature as it as a great source of love and lust to feed on. Griffins, mostly singles, often take treks and vacations in Equestria. Dragons-Pony breeding are extremely rare due to size difference but it is rumored that Thestrals has Dragon Origins.

A Sexually open Equestria, eh? The dream of every brony.

And you had found it all by a random chance.

Well... you had an entire week preparing, maybe is time to see around the neightborhood?

Books can only give so many details, go outside and look around

153132224.content:
Your eyes roved over the page, eyebrows slowly rising to critical levels. You expected that there would be differences in culture, certainly, but you never could've anticipated anything like this!
It seems like for whatever reason, be it the female leaning gender skew, cultural traditions from times long past, or simply the fact that all of their rulers are nigh immortal goddesses, this version of Equestria has a distinctly female perspective on things. In fact, it seems that all of the books on Equestrian history and culture were produced by mare scholars.

Ay least, you think they're mares. Many of them eschewed writing their given names on the books for their cutie marks instead. You had to piece together who is writing what from context clues written in the texts themselves, a somewhat challenging and at times frustrating task to be quite honest.
Allusions to female genitalia are pretty common and mares boasting about how their pussies were so tight and responsive they could satisfy any stallion abound.
You actually crack up at a bard claiming that she could assemble a sandwich with her pelvic floor muscles alone and glibly wipe a tear from your eye.

Even more common is the assertion that stallions are more important than mares in the arena of reproduction because they provide the life-giving seed to grow the next generation of ponies and mares are merely the vessels designed to carry that seed.
You don't know if any of that's true, or how many ponies still believe this, but it kind of makes you feel a bit sorry for them like they get little to no respect for the act of knitting a new life together in the womb...


Should you keep reading or take a breather?
153132224.title: Its rather sexist.

choices: Go to Twilight's castle, it's possible they already returned from their trip
Head to the center of town, it's where it's likely you'll meet the most ponies
A mare boldly comes up to you to say hello
As you're walking a trio of screaming fillies come flying at you
Go full Twilight mode and hide in the bushes to observe
1531322242.content:
You decisively snapped the book shut, laid it on the desk. You stretched out your arms and yawned, then gazed over at the clock on the wall. The clock was set to automatically sync itself to the same time zone of the world you were exploring, and the clock face read that it was about 1 o'clock in the afternoon, meaning there was still plenty of time in the day to go out exploring. As much as you like doing research inside from the safety of your own home, you're not going to learn much about Equestrian culture by sitting around here and reading dusty books all day.

You pushed out your chair and stood up before levitating the books back onto their shelves with a wave of your hand.
In alphabetical order of course. You weren't some kind of heathen, after all.

You snapped your fingers and suddenly you were right outside your front door, not even bothering to make the trip by foot.

You took a deep breath of the cool, clean air, and then exhaled, before grinning widely. It was springtime in Equestria and the gentle breeze flowing over you felt both cool and refreshing. Gotta love that sweet, clean, pollution-free air. It was a new day in Equestria, and the entire world awaits.

What will you do now?
1531322242.title: Out on the town

choices: You stay indoors for now, Tomorrow you'll be exploring the town.
Go and research an cure for their problem
153132225.content:
Slow Decline...?

Equestria has a problem with the stallion population as its far less numerous than it was centuries ago during the warring tribes and the founding of Equestria, it was estimated that it was a perfect 50 to 50 in both gender, but on the passing centuries, the Male Chromosome has been declining and there are more fillies being born than colts with rising of 60%. To have colt today is considered a blessing from the stars themselves.

It is estimated that Equestria has a male-female population ratio of 10 to 90, favoring mares. Because of this, Herds and Polygamy has turned more popular while monogamy has been declining steadily. Due to the gender disparity, Stallions are considered as the fair gender and are coddle from colthood to stallionhood, making them seem frail and sometimes, inept; they're expected to have passive jobs as creators, farmers, traders, shapers, builders and caretakers while mares take the more active roles such as pioneers, adventurers, and explorers although males taking more active role isn't discouraged either, Many of those stallions are in the "royal guards" doing their duty to protect the capital city and the princesses with military training but in reality they're protected by the real Equestrian Guard conformed by half the Mares population in Canterlot and the Princesses themselves they're sworn to protect.

Equestria is entering through a hard time now with a declining population that other species and kingdoms are eyeing the land closely, more likely for an easy conquest in the future. It is estimated that the Male gender may become extinct in the next few generations and the rest of the species may follow next.


That's a grim prospect for a setting that is usually bright and upbeat. Extinction? is something that isn't even mentioned in the series and what about other races and kingdoms wanting Equestria for easy conquest? The Stallion gender is in heavy decline if that ratio is sure and yikes! 10 to 90? that might be a dream for perverts but not for the survival of an entire species

Unfortunately, you can't help with that, You simply don't know how and while Biomancy is something you're expert on, It wasn't something that should be tried on foreign land. For all you know, You may be commiting a capital crime.

You rather stick with just observing and be a knowledgeable tourist, for now.

You close up the Lexicon and moved away from the books, teleporting them away to the central library of your mansion.
153132225.title: Its in slow Decline?

choices: You find a pony and stroke up a conversation
A curious filly trots up alongside and begins talking to you
A small group of mares approach from behind and follow you throught the town

You're not going to learn anything meaningful staying around here, it's high time you left your hone and explored the town.

Ponyville is a bustling and thriving town full of colorful characters (literally) and stories that were ready to unfurl.
Surely speaking to its inhabitants os sure to bring many helpful insight into this world.
You took a deep breath of fresh air and started walking without any real destination in mind, curiously looking around and greeting ponies as they passed. A few of them giggled when you waved to them and returned the gesture, before turning back to their friends and excitedly chattered among themselves, probably about your presence here in town.
You could see Twilight's castle towering above all the rest and sparkling in the morning sunlight.
Sadly its mistress is not home at the moment so you'll be unable to meet the princess for the time being.

While you're walking along...

1531322252231.content:
"...Me! I'm very interested in you."
That stopped you in your tracks. You gazed down at the filly in surprise.
"You want to know about...me?" you asked uncertainly.
Diamond Tiara nodded back and cheerfully replied. "Uh-huh! I want to know all there is to know about you, what your home life was like, are you ruled by a queen, and most importantly..."
She then tilted her head to the side and gave you a queer look, ".. why do you wear those ugly robes all the time?"
This was quite a twist. You certainly hadn't expected Diamond Tiara of all ponies to be the one to approach you with questions about your culture
This could be a problem. A filly had identified you from a race of long dead human analogues and possibly mistaken you for one of their number.
All you really wished to do was quietly observe from afar and not get directly involved in pony affairs, but it seems fate had other things in store for you.
What were you supposed to say? You knew just about as much of this "Kingdom of Man" as they did, and even then your knowledge was limited to a couple sentences from a dusty old book. You didn't want to lie to the filly or make it look like you have something to hide, but you also weren't sure exactly how much you wanted to reveal about yourself.

All of the sudden, you became acutely aware of several sets of eyes watching you.
While you had been engaged in conversation with Tiara, out of the corner of your eye you spotted a small group of ponies gathering nearby,while still keeping a respectable distance away from you and Tiara. They seemed to be only only watchful and weren't agitated by your proximity to the lone filly, thank God. You didn't want the local populace thinking of you as some kind of creepy pedophile or something. Still, it would be best to be on your best behavior as to avoid an incident.
You took a deep breath and searched yourself for the best answer to give to the filly's question that won't insult her intelligence.
Diamond Tiara's wide glittering eyes gazed up at you like you were just the paragon of human knowledge and you were about to pass down some of your greatest secrets.
You gulped and made a show of tugging at the collar of your robe. "Well... you see, where I come from, we wear clothes to protect our bodies from the elements while outdoors, with the type and amount of clothing varying depending on the situation. It's considered immodest and indecent to expose yourself completely to other people in public, so humans have to wear clothes constantly. Not only that, but in most places it's also illegal to walk around in the nude and if you're caught you can get arrested and fined for indecent exposure."
Diamond Tiara narrowed her eyes, wrinkled her nose and her cute little muzzle scrunched up in confusion. "Illegal? You mean you can get thrown in jail for not wearing any clothes? That sounds like an awful place to live. I can't even imagine being forced to wear some stuffy dress every day."
You helplessly spread your hands and replied, "Trust me, it's a lot more complicated than I make it sound. There's a lot of. factors stemming from traditional and religious sources guiding our society. It's not all bad, technology has made the production of clothing pretty cheap and there's a large variety of fashions to choose from."
Tiara didn't seem too convinced by your explanation, however. In fact she seemed even more skeptical than before. Her ears drooped and her eyes were covered in a wet sheen. "Still, having to cover yourself like that is just so sad. How can anypony ever know what your special talent is if they can't see your cutie mark? It's like living in a Saddle Arabian harem..."
You were about to reply that humans didn't have any cutie marks to show when her mood suddenly brightened and she said "Oh, I'just had a great idea! Why don't you..."

15313222522313222.content:
Diamond Tiara suddenly got a determined look in her eye, and before you could utter a word she reared up onto her hind legs and embraced you, wrapping her hooves around your waist and pulling her face close to your belly.
A quiet, muffled whisper wafted up from "It's alright, everything will be fine. You don't have to be alone anymore. You're among friends here."
A growing heat blossomed in your chest, which quickly spread like wildfire throughout your body and into your extremities.
You opened your mouth multiple times to say something, anything to get her to stop, that you appreciated the gesture but you didn't need it, but the more you struggled against the thought the more a simple but powerful truth began to overwhelm your good sense.
You did need this. No one had ever shown you this level of affection before outside of your grandmother, and the longer you thought about it the more you craved it.
Diamond Tiara's tiny body pressing against you awakened something deep down inside, something that you couldn't quite explain yet
You wanted the hug to last forever, for this moment to be frozen in time so you'd never have to let go, but alas, you soon felt her grip loosen and her hooves drag along your sides until they inevitably dropped back to earth.

Your eyes grew misty with tears, which you moved to wipe away with the sleeve of your robe.
"Thank you" you almost silently murmured, the heartfelt words floating down to the filly's sensitive ears.
Tiara looked at you with pure joy, and craned her neck to affectionately nuzzle your hand.
"You're welcome," she answered pointedly, then pressed her face back into your groin and took a deep whiff.
A subtle hint of cotton candy tickled your nose, wafting in from someplace but you couldn't tell exactly where.

Tiara wiped eyes her eyes clean of tears and sniffled, before blowing into a monogrammed handkerchief (hoofkerchief?).
that she pulled out of nowhere.
"O-okay, now that's out of the way, I think we should go out and have some fun, don't you?"

There's quite a few different continuities of Sonic the hedgehog.

There's the Adventure series, which is the canon video game series. This might have crossovers with other series, like with other Sega series or even Mario.

There's the Classic series, which is the Genesis series and the Sonic Mania series. This might crossover with the Adventure series.

There's Sonic X, the anime series, which you have two worlds to explore, Sonic's world and the human world.

Then there's The Archie Comic series, which was a long runner. This has plenty of crossovers with many other comic series, even with a comic version of Sonic X!

Your thought of changing into something strong and mighty, but then you thought the best way to get along with other mobians is to be something more friendly looking. You thought being a rabbit was the best way to go.

Now that you made you decision, you were about to begin using your magic tablet until you noticed the gateway that brought you here. You decided to close it so not to risk any random mobian to come across it and you didn’t need to worry as you can open the gateway again easily, provided you have plenty of mana to use at that moment. You then used the magic tablet and and a magical aura enveloped your entire body. You couldn’t see it but you can feel your transformation starting. Your body started to shrink a bit matching the same size of any average size teenage mobian. Your ears disappeared and then you felt something growing on the top of your head. It was a pair of rabbit ears that rose up and in mid length bent forward a bit thus completing the formation of the ears. Then your feet started to change by growing bursting through your shoes then you saw them looking more animal like growing fur on them and behind you a fluffy tail was forming. Once the transformation was finished the magic aura disappeared and you wondered how you look.

Using the magic tablet, you conjured something like a mirror to see your reflection. The first thing that caught your eye was that your fur color which was a light blue which could have been a side effect of the magic which you thought was weird. But then the more you thought of it you realize this might be considered normal. After all there are animals like a “blue” hedgehog and “purple” cat which you knew wouldn’t be normal fur color for those animals from your universe. You looked some more and saw that your rabbit ears looked fine, you had a white muzzle growing around your mouth, and your eyes were quite large compared to your human eyes. Your clothes changed as well since the robe you wore changed into a nice vest that covers most of your back and sides only leaving the front exposed where you can see a white oval of fur in the center of your front. You also saw white gloves now over your rabbit paws.You were expecting this since you saw the shows and comics, the lower part of you that made you a male was hidden but you can still feel that it was still there. You turned around to see you fluffy tail and gave it a way to show you can move it.

The final thing to observe was your legs and feet. Your legs were long and somehow you can feel that they were powerful. Your feet were slightly big and they managed to ruin your shoes so you thought of making new shoes, but maybe being barefoot would be beneficial instead of being cramped and weighed down by footwear of any kind. “Let’s try this lower half out”. You did a small hop letting your feet touch the ground then squatted to feel the strength build up in your legs then hopped once more and you You travel forward quickly at a kind distance before touching the ground again. You then got near a tree and started squatting to once again build strength in your legs and did a hop straight up and you got high up to almost to the top of the tree. You had powerful legs to jump high and hop long distances while your big feet would help cushion each jump you made. You heard rabbits were fast so you ran to see how fast you can run. You were faster than human form, but no way in being Sonic fast. There was one last test to try using both your legs, feet, and the tree you used to test your jumping capabilities. You made one powerful hop launching you towards the tree and once you made contact with your feet you put all the force in your feet towards the tree and bounced off it before landing on the ground again. You take a look at the tree to see there was a crater where you made impact with your feet showing your feet and legs were quite powerful. Overall, you were pretty satisfied with your transformation.

The last thing you considered was your magic tablet since even though it shrunk when it became tablet size it was still large and you didn’t want to carry it all the time as someone might notice it. You then came up with an idea and focused your magic. The tablet glowed and then disappears for moment and in the next it appeared around your neck as a necklace. Now it looks like an accessory out of sight and can be reverted back to its original form when needed to.

You were now ready to explore this different universe, but where will you start? You did see a town in the distance but you chose to not go there, at least not yet. You then decided to travel through portal as you held the necklace in one hand and focused your magic and a portal appeared. The only problem was that the portal works well when you knew the location of where you wanted to go, but since you didn’t the portal will send you anywhere randomly. You decided to let luck guide you as you closed your eyes and walked into the portal. Once you felt you went through you opened your eyes and was amazed by a beautiful sight. When looking up you see a beautiful clear blue sky that stretched out for miles not being obstructed by any trees. When you look down you see a field filled with many beautiful flowers of many colors in which you thought a rainbow was spread on the floor. A light breeze blows through and you see all the flowers move and even petals fly in the air.

Though you thought this felt peaceful and nice where you were able to view a beautiful scene, you wondered why the portal would send you here of all places. Did your necklace send you there for a reason?You decided to brush it off and enjoy the scenery a bit more.

Cheese and Chocola both were pleased at you becoming part of the Rabbit family, though for different reasons.

The two Chao spoke with each other.

Cheese was pleased that Cream had a little brother, as Cream sometimes wondered what life would be like to have a sibling.

"Hey, maybe we could convince Cream and Vanilla to take the first step with [Y/N]? He's not genetically related to them, so it's okay," Chocola asked.

"How?" Cheese asked.

"I don't think we should do that..." Cheese muttered.

"We'll stop and explain everything if they get too angry with him," Chocola replied.

Cheese slowly nodded, not feeling too sure about Chocola's plan.

===

A day later you were helping Vanilla dust and clean the living room. She was looking away and was bending over. You blushed whenever you looked in her direction while her rear seemed to be shaking itself in your direction. At the moment, you were walking back and forth, dusting areas that your new family couldn't reach.

In the middle of the room was a long carpet that had nothing pinning it down. one end of the carpet was at the entrance of the room and Vanilla stood at the other end.

You began, "Hey, Vanilla-"

"Call me Mom. That way, the Adoption will be more believable to anyone spying on us," Vanilla said, re-arraigning some movies.

"Makes sense.... Mom," You replied. Chocola and Cheese grabbed the ends of the carpet near the entrance.

"That's better," Vanilla said, sounding pleased. Cheese and Chocola lifted and lowered the carpet, creating a moving bump that seemed like it was aiming for you.

"So Mom, I was thinking-" You uttered right before the moving bump hit you, sending you in the air as the bump vanished. You crashed against something soft, so you grabbed onto it to prevent yourself from falling.

"Oh my! How forward!" Vanilla's voice said, letting you realize what you landed against.

You currently were hanging onto Vanilla's divine-sized derriere. You slowly climbed down, saying, "S-sorry. something just threw me into the air.

"If you say so," Vanilla replied. Her tone was odd, like she wasn't angry at all, but no hint of if she believed you or not.

===

The next day, you and Vanilla went shopping for clothes, even though you could use magic to make some. When you came home, Vanilla was insistent about washing the clothes. You gave a similar argument about using magic, but Vanilla merely shook her head.

So you wandered about a bit before she asked you to check if the washing machine was done.

As you walked to the laundry room, Cheese and Chocola waited in the room out of sight and held some nearly invisible string. when you stepped in, they held up the string, which caused you to trip and somehow land in a laundry basket that was as tall as you.

When they heard you scream as you tripped. Cream and Vanilla ran to the laundry room. The two Chao did their best to look like they had ran as well.

You started to climb out of the laundry basket and noticed the reactions of the others.

The Chao covered their mouths in surprise, though Chocola’s eyes seemed amused.

Vanilla covered her mouth with a single hand and seemed amused.

Cream had her hands at her hips and her cheeks were puffed out in a cute pout. her eyes showed that either she was angry at you or was just really annoyed.

“I tripped,” You answered.

“I’d believe you better if one of my bras wasn’t on your head like a hat and one of Creams’ panties wasn’t around your neck,”
Vanilla said, sounding amused and embarrassed.

You felt your head and discovered that indeed, Vanilla was right. You carefully took off the underwear and dropped them, feeling rather embarrassed that you landed in a laundry bin filled with underwear.

===

It took a few days, but Cream managed to talk with you again. The Chao chose to wait on their pranks, not wanting to risk being found out.

“[Y/N], I have a friend coming over. Her name is Amy Rose,” Cream explained.

“Right, I’ll be on my best behavior,” you replied.

Cream shook her head. “No, that’s not the problem… Well, maybe a little. The thing is that Amy is a little too boy-crazy, even though she’s never seen a boy in real life before. She’s read a lot of comics, hentai, manga, anime, and a whole bunch of other stuff that Mama doesn’t like me knowing about. I think it may have done a number on her.”

“So.. Keep my distance and make sure I’m with you, Mom, or the Chao while she's here?” you asked.

“Right. Now let’s go wait on the porch for Amy to arrive,” Cream replied before picking you up and carrying you outside.

"Hey! I can walk, y'know!" You pleaded.

"And risk you pulling down my panties?" Cream answered.

"I'm not a pervert! They were all accidents!" You pleaded.

She looked away from you, covered her face with her hands, and giggled like a school girl before looking back at you.

You asked, "So... what? Is there a lack of males in this world?"

Amy frowned a little before nodding. "Enough that scientists are worried it might lead to serious problems in a few generations."

"Well, it's not like I'll be kidnapped and molested against my will, right?" You asked.

Amy looked for a moment, giggled nervously, and rubbed the back of her head. Looking back at you, she gave you a fake smile, saying, "You'll be fine as long as you're with me and my friends!"

You thought, 'I might have bitten off more than I can handle.'

You took another deep breath before asking, "So... I'm [Y/N]. Going by the pictures, you're Amy Rose?"

Now that she calmed down, Amy nodded. "My friends are Sonia the Hedgehog, Millie the fox, Cream the Rabbit, and Tikal the echidna."

1553321.content:
Aw, yeah Toontown! You've always wanted to visit that place. You always found it intriguing that there might be a place where all your favorite characters coexist.
Moreover humans haven't been seen in Toontown in a long time, so your arrival would probably cause quite a stir.
Heck, you might even get lucky and meet a nice girl or two.
You opened up a portal and gleefully stepped through.
As if reacting to your presence a long tunnel of concentric rings formed ahead of you, much like what they had on those old Looney Tunes shorts.A familiar tune was playing from somewhere, and the closer you got to the end of the tunnel the louder it became.
As soon as you stepped through the portal s disembodied voice spoke into your ear and confetti sprayed from absolutely nowhere, sticking fast to your coat.
Welcome to Toontown, the wackiest place around. Please enjoy your stay! Please also be wary of any overly friendly female Toons offering companionship, It's most likely a trap. Many of them have a human fetish and can be sexually aggressive when in the mood, making it a particularly dangerous place for humans. Good luck and have a nice visit!
OK that was weird, you could've sworn that you heard that voice give you a warning about female toons. You were kind of preoccupied with wiping the sticky confetti off of you.
Oh well, it couldn't have been that important, right?

After cleaning yourself off and patting down the creases to look presentable, you took your final steps.

Not wanting to risk immediately getting sexually assaulted, you looked through the book and cast the invisibility spell on yourself.

Once you were invisible, you nodded and left the tunnel.

Outside the tunnel was a fairly nice forest woodland. You looked back and saw that the tunnel was still there. So you walked around it and saw that the entrance was on a rock that couldn't hold the the tunnel. You shrugged and went on your way, walking the side of the road.

As you walked, you looked around.

On one side of the road, there was a forest, one that could be the background of any forest-based cartoon. Next to it was a lake with a river. The River had a sign that read, 'this way to the ocean'.

'Huh, neat,' You thought as you spotted a small boat. The small boat had a small sign, 'Back in five minutes'.

You wondered if the boat owner would mind if you borrowed the boat. You knew there was a few cartoons that either had a river episode, an ocean episode, or took place entirely either over water or under water.

Looking at the other side of the road, you saw that it led to some plains that had a desert in the far distance. You recalled a number of cartoon series that took place in either plains or deserts. A number of them were action cartoons and did have a woman or two in the main cast.

You wondered if the desert would lead you to Bravestarr or the Cowboys of Moo Mesa.

Looking down the road, you saw a city that had a variety of buildings, some tall, some small, and some in between. All the buildings looked like either they were alive or were just background.

You nodded as you thought, 'Now that's the Toon Town I remember!"

1553321112.content:
You were in the middle of a forest with no idea who might be in it. Not only that, but going by the cry, human males were a hot commodity here, possibly the rest of this toon world.

So you panicked a little. You first used an illusion spell to hide yourself, then another to make it look like you ran off in some direction. Then a shrinking spell and ran under the flat rock, where there was a hole big enough for a small animal or two.

After hearing the stampede run by and away, you let you let out a sigh of relief.

Then a voice said, “Golly! That was a fright! What caused it?”
“Oh, someone realized that I’m a human male and I guess going by how some of the eyes were looking at me, that must mean I’m some kind of sex object,” You answered without realizing as you carefully looked around outside.

“If you’re human, then how come you’re so small?” the voice asked, sounding a bit curious.

“I have a book of spells from my grandma. I can use magic from my mother’s side, but she didn’t care much for it aside from money,” You answered before realizing you were talking to someone. You slowly looked back and saw Gadget Hackwrench. Deciding to be polite, you said, “My name is Alex. Who are you?”

Gadget smiled and replied, “My name is Gadget Hackwrench. I’m a Rescue Ranger! Normally, I work with others, but we’ve been stretched thin, so I’m working by myself at the moment.”

You thought quickly. If you left her alone, she might let you go or might be spiteful and call attention to you. If you worked with her, she might kidnap you or help you find spells to add to your book. But you had a heart of gold and didn’t want her left alone. So you said, “Well, if you need help, I can offer whatever I can do.”

“Golly, that is sure sweet of you! I’ll gladly accept your help!” Gadget said before giving you a quick kiss on your cheek. “First thing we gotta do is head to the Ranger Plane. I was trying to recruit some field mice to help me, but they refused. Can you sue your spell book to move some foot petals?”

“Sure,” You answered, remembering that the Ranger Plane was petal-powered. You followed her outside. As the two of you climbed a rope to the top of the rock, you asked, “But how did you get here?”

“I made a motor that could move the petals, but it kind of worn itself out when I neared the rock,” Gadget sheepishly answered.

When the two of you reached the rock top and neared the Ranger Plane, you took out the book and began to look through it. Gadget asked, “What kind of spells can you do?”

“Well, invisibility, shrinking, growing, teleportation, mass alteration, plane-walking, and a few others. I can always learn more, but I need to either see it in action or read other spell books,” You answered as you continued to look through it.

“Golly! All of that sounds like a lot of fun! Can anyone else use your spell book?” Gadget asked.

You paused before you answered, “I don’t know. I like to hope that only I can use it, but I never asked my grandma.”

1553321113.content:
You rushed towards the tower's front entrance, an imposing oaken door that was at least twice your size.
A great brass ring adorned each individual door serving as handles.
You fervently hoped that the door wasn't locked, you didn't want to draw the attention of anyone lurking inside.
Thankfully, a cursory tug on the door handle revealed the way to be unlocked,
You rushed inside and closed the door behind you, breathing heavily in a soft panic.
Immediately you heard hushed voices coming from beyond the dark entry hall.
"Did you hear something Sawyer? It sounded like someone just came through the front door."
"Ugh, I told those people I didn't want whatever they're selling. I mean, who in their right mind would buy flatten-proof long underwear? We nearly always reinflate ourselves anyway."
"I don't know, but I think we might have an intruder. We better go check it out."
Oh. Oh fuck. That's not good.
The dwelling was already occupied and you attracted the attention of it's owners.
You can't go back outside until the coast is clear so you might be forced to evade them until things cool down.

Not wanting to stand around and make yourself a sitting duck you scurried forward, mindful of the footsteps that were rapidly getting closer.
Now, where to hide?
There was an open door with a lit kitchen and dining room with small wooden cabinets, a modern looking stove, a modern looking fridge, multiple pots and pans hanging from the ceiling and a neat looking cloth covered table in the center of the room.
Other than that, there was no place to lay in, the cabinets all looked far too small.
This place is bust, better find another room and quick.
Next to the kitchen was a stone stairway leading up the upper floors of the tower, can't go up that way.
You frantically searched along the wall, hands pressed into the stonework and gasped in delight when your palms slid over something wooden.
Jackpot.
You yanked the door open and thrust yourself inside, pressed against the back wall, and waited.
And waited. And waited.
The footsteps stopped, and your heart started beating again.
Phew that was a close one.
"Well, ain't you just a tall glass of water."
Your blood froze.
You slowly turned around, terrified at what you were going to find.
Two blue eyes with slit pupils shone in the darkness, and not much else.
"Well, sugar, you done come in here. Ain't you gonna introduce yourself?"
"Gaaaaah" you screamed, then quickly tore into the closet door, slamming it open and hitting the two cat ladies who were standing outside.
The door swung back open to reveal Sawyer and Calico Briggs, both completely flattened from the impact.
"You were saying about those flatten-proof long johns?"
"Shut. Up. Callie."
Miss Kitty, one of the female cats from An American Tale: Fievel Goes West, calmly stepped out of the broom closet, unfazed from the whole ordeal.
"Now you two pull yourselves together, we've got a human on the loose in the house and he's probably lost and frightened." She softly chided at her two housemates.
Sawyer, who reinflated first, sat up and rubbed at her poor sore noggin.
"Owww, my head... Damn, that hurt. What did you say about s human being in the house? Aren't they supposed to be this mythical creature?"
"Apparently they're not so imaginary, since one just charged out of our broom closet, Callie quipped while rubbing her nose.
Kitty arched her back and waved her paws in excitement
"C'mon girls, let's go find him. They say that having a human living in your house is good luck, and they're the cuddliest creatures you'll ever meet."
This seemed to convince her housemates, who looked at each other and each gave a toothy grin.

15533222.content:
The portal behind you closes. Only a few seconds later, the only thing, you can see if the tiny rock of a beacon that signals the spot in this world, which you need to go back to, if you ever want to leave, in order to get back to the spot where you left in your home world.

In front of you, you see the familiar castle, Hogwarts, towering in the clear night sky.

Someone taps you on the shoulder with their finger.

"That's not Hogwarts, just so you know it", a female voice says.

You turn around. "What?", you ask. You see, it is Hermione. Even though, she is an adult already, you recognize her.

"Yeah, I saw you appeared out of nothing and you look all confused, just lying there on the ground. So, I assumed, you thought, you were at Hogwarts", she says.

"Well...", you scratch your head a little. "Where am I then?"

"Akra Ingall. The Ministry of Foreign affairs. I work here", Hermione replies.

"Are we far from Hogwarts?", you ask very intrigued.

She chuckles a bit. "Quite far, yeah!"

"I mean, without apparition, it would take weeks to get here. How did you end up here by the way?"

You are not sure yet, whether you should tell Hermione the truth, or just make something up...

1553322311333.content:
There's the world of Shantae.

Plenty of action, adventure, and attractive women, ranging from good to evil.

Will you help Shantae the half genie go on adventures and save the world? She is the most innocent option, despite being able to transform into a variety of animals and plenty of them are monster girls.

Or will you help Rottytops the zombie prank anyone in her way? While she is a zombie, she keeps her wits by drinking coffee. Doesn't stop her from making flirty comments about eating people's brains, though. She's also loyal to her friends and thus won't go too far with them.

Or will you join Risky Boots the Pirate Queen and help her conquer Sequin Land and then the world? She will flirt with you to get you to do stuff for her. If she learns you can do magic, you might not be able to escape her sexy grasp. She's a skilled tool user and is quick to to learn how to use new machines. She has Dark magic, bur can't use it, save to upgrade her equipment.

Perhaps you might do the stupid thing and revive Nega-Shantae? She's Shantae's evil side. She's kinda like Risky in terms of personality, but can use magic.

There's plenty of other girls, but they're for you to discover!

Or will you aim for the harem route? Take care to please all of them or risk one of your harem members becoming annoyed enough to over your harem and you becoming the harem's boytoy?

Risky Boots forcibly recruits you into her pirate crew
A Bat Gal puts an Amulet of Absolute Obedience around your neck
15533223113331.content:
You decided to visit the world that Shantae resides in. There were several reasons.

One was they'd be familiar with magic and tech, so you wouldn't have to explain too hard.
Another was you could learn a good amount of new magic.
A third was that a good amount of heroes, villains, and monsters are all cute, sexy girls.

So after entering a portal that had faint images of Shantae's adventures, you landed within viewing distance of Scuttle Town.

You smiled as you headed towards the town, knowing that one way or another, yours and Shantae's paths would meet.

There were a few monsters, like Scarecrows, bats, orcs, snakes, spiders, and other enemies that often appeared at the beginning of Shantae's adventures. You dealt with them all with fireballs and lightning spells. Each enemy left behind some gems, which was the money for the world. You eventually had to use your magic book to create a bag of holding for the gems.

A thought occurred to you, 'I wonder if I can create a harem? I know there's more than enough cute monsters girls in this world for it.'

You tried to avoid thinking about that, but it did keep popping back up. You did the math and came to the conclusion that it had a 50/50 chance of succeeding. The failure ending for it? you become the servant/boytoy of your harem, obeying all of their orders.

Assuming they don't simply beat you up, of course.

You eventually got the feeling you were being watched, so you stopped looking for new spells in the book less and less. You didn't want to risk the book getting stolen, after all.

The feeling of being watched didn't go away. In fact, it seemed to increase, like the person was getting ready to attack.

You didn't get too worried, as Shantae's games were on the light side. Even though you recalled your Grandma's warning about the worlds might be different than you expected them to be, the world you're in couldn't be too dangerous, right?

Then you felt a presence behind you, making you turn around to deal with them.
15533223113331.title: Let's visit the world of Shantae!

choices: you found the Tinkerbat and set up a trap.

you get knocked out by a yandere Shantae, who now obsesses over you
you decide to go after Shantae
155332231133311.content:
Right behind you was Shantae.

She had her hands on her hips and a frown on her face.

Obviously, she was suspicious.

"Who are you?" She asked.

"I am [Y/N] and I am a traveller," You answered. "And you are?"

"I am Shantae, half-genie guardian of Scuttle Town. What are you doing here?" Shantae asked, letting one hand drop from her hips.

"Merely travelling. My grandma gave me a magic book and told me to travel worlds," You answered. "If there is a problem, I'd be happy to help, especially with someone as cute and attractive as you."

Shantae blushed before looking away. "Uh, thanks."

"Then again, you probably get a lot of complements from just about everyone you meet," You said. You knew she had confidence problems, so you wanted to help with that.

She idly began to play with her ponytail, muttering, "Actually, you're kind of the first, outside of Rottytops. She's one of my friends and she is a zombie."

"Well, I'm glad to have brightened up your day a little. So what brought you out here?" you asked. She kept giving you quick glances, like a shy schoolgirl. She looked adorable and even a bit sexy.

"I heard rumors that a tinkerbat was seen around here. Since I haven't seen their Pirate leader, Risky Boots, for awhile, I decided to be proactive for once and stop her before she can complete one of her schemes," Shantae answered as she looked at you with a smile.

"I'd be happy to help," You said with a bow.

"Thanks, but don't be surprised if you can't keep up," Shantae replied before doing a belly dance. She changed into a monkey. "Because I can change into any animal with a dance!"

She ran off out of your sight.

You took out your book and looked for a find-person spell.

15533223221.content:
Just to briefly explain things: Road Rovers was a show from the 1990s that followed five dogs anthropomorphized by something called a ‘transdogmifier’. Referred to ‘Cano-sapiens’, they were used by Professor Shephard, aka ‘The Master’, to combat the evil General Parvo. The five dogs, who in the canon storyline were all placed with world leaders, were:
1 Hunter, an American Golden Retriever with super speed who led the team
2 Colleen, a British Border Collie and the only female in the team
3 Blitz, a German Doberman with the ability to bite into most things
4 Exile (Exilo Michalovitch Sanhusky), a Russian Husky with super vision (think producing heat or cold from the eyes, for example) and super strength, and
5 Shag, a Swiss OES (Old English Sheepdog) who looks the least humanoid of the team, but is still biped, in cano-sapiens form.

There were actually eight dogs in the recurring cast, the other three being Muzzle (formerly Scout), a Rottweiler; Persia, an Afghan Hound ‘Space Rover’ (think astronaut); and Professor Hubert, a Bloodhound scientist. Also, Hunter had a mother, as did Exile (along with his father).

Explaining over, do you enter the regular Road Rovers universe, or do you enter a different version of the universe?
15533223221.title: Road Rovers

155332232212.content:
Ok then, what about this one?

The idea here is that, instead of being nominally just the main five (plus Muzzle), the Road Rovers are a global movement of thousands of Cano-Sapiens answering to the name and ideals of The Master. Hunter would lead the American Road Rovers (and the global movement at large) from the White House (where he lives with the human US President), Colleen would lead the British Road Rovers from 10 Downing Street (where she lives with the human PM of Britain), Blitz would lead the German Road Rovers from Bellevue Palace, Berlin (where he lives with the human Chancellor) and Exile would lead the Russian Road Rovers from the Kremlin (where he lives with the human President of Russia), while Shag would have an important position in the Swiss Road Rovers (leader, if you want) based in Bern. The five would still team up on occasion, alone, with members of their national units alongside them, or with other national Road Rover leaders. The transdogmifier still exists in this scenario (the Road Rovers would not be without it), and the Rovers can use it to switch between Cano-sapien and regular form depending on whether they’re on active duty, on alert, or off-duty. Each Road Rover lives with a family, and the national leads can call for their subordinates to report for duty if necessary, but only The Master can call for a national leader if they are off-duty.

In addition, space is considered by the Rovers as a ‘nation’, with Persia as the national leader for space, while Hubert provides scientific assistance to the current leader of the global movement.

Is this idea good enough for you?
155332232212.title: Different

info.brief_description: You're a dimensional traveler, able to open portals to other universes and dimensions.
info.description:
On the outside, you're a normal person but you hold the secret of multiversal travel through a magic book you uncovered from your family's old stash, magic exists, who knew? However, you were taught by your grandmother who was a witch or rather a plane-sorcerer in her youth and revealed the secret of dimensional travel to you, able to fly and even change your size and mass.

There aren't limits now for you can go through the planes on your leisure.

Rules:

You can do whatever you want, there aren't limits but do not end the storyline.

Also, no Scat, Diaper, or Toilet content.

Everything else is fair game.
